text: Michinori Iwaguro (; born 10 December 1966) is a Japanese rower. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Japan Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in rowing Category:Rowers at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Rowers at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1994 Asian Games
title: Michinori Iwaguro
